ProductInfo.Features:
ZMODO KDK6-NARQZ8ZN-2T16 Channel H.264 High Profile Full D1 Hybrid DVR Security Camera System with 8 Sony CCD Indoor/Outdoor Surveillance Cameras & 2TB Hard Drive
TOP REASONS TO BUY - Not Baseline, Not Main Profile, It's H.264 High Profile. Full 16CH D1 Real Time Recording and Playback. HDMI / VGA / BNC Synchronous Video Outputs. Handy Application of 16CH Video Loop Out. Easy Backup via DVD-RW & USB Flash Drive. Supports Access Internet via Wi-Fi Card. Mass Storage with 4x SATA Interface, Supports up to 8TB
DVR FEATURES - Dual Stream to Customize Video Frame Rate, Perfect Matching Services Along with the DVR, 16CH Alarm Inputs & 2CH Alarm Outputs, Multiple Recording Modes, View Online or On a Smart Phone, Instant Email Alerts if Activity Detected, Easy-To-Read GUI design, Intuitive and Hassle-Free Operation, Multiple Playback Modes, Versatile Network Functionalities, The DVR that Multi-tasks, Search by Date, Time or Event
CAMERA FEATURES - 1/4" Sony CCD Image Sensor, 420 TV Lines Horizontal, 3.6mm Lens* Signal: NTSC, Night Vision Min. Light: 0 Lux (IR On), IR Irradiation Distance: up to 65'* Operation Temperature: -25°F~122°F, Weatherproof: Yes, Power: 12V DC* Mount: Wall* Video Connector: BNC, Power Connector: RCA 12V DC
PACKAGE INCLUDES: (1) ZMD-DH-SEN6-2TB 16 Channel Hybrid DVR,with 2TB Hard Drive, (8) ZMD-CNR-BBB23NM Outdoor IR Security Camera, (8) 60ft CCTV Power + Video Cables for Security Cameras, (2) 12V/1500mA Single Power Supply for Security Cameras, (2) 1-4 Splitter Cable for Security Cameras, (1) Power Supply for DVR, (1) IR Remote Control & Mouse, (1) User's Manual, (1) CD Software
ProductInfo.Name: Zmodo KDK6-NARQZ8ZN-2T 16Channel CCTV 8xSony CCD Outdoor Cameras with 2TB HDD Surveillance Kit
